name: Vogelbescherming Nederland
goal: Vogelbescherming Nederland strives to conserves wild birds and their habitat, in The Netherlands and worldwide. With people who care for birds and nature. In this way we contribute to the conservation of nature and a healthy living environment.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Energy, Environment, International co-operation and development
euInitiatives: Biodiversity, Natura2000, agriculture (CAP), fisheries, environment, climate change
